name: Science Quest
description:
Rules/How To Play

There are only a few things you need to know when playing science quest. The first thing is that you need to follow the hints extremely carefully. If you don't you might throw the entire storyline off.

Controls - You can use the up, down, right, left, and backwards keys on the keyboard to control the player, or just click where you want to go wit the mouse. To talk to a player just run into them and the message will pop up. To answer a question use the up and down keys to chose an answer and ten hit the enter key to submit your answer.

Saving and Exiting the game - To save the game press the escape key on your keyboard and click on the save option, then select the spot you want to save your game to. To end the game hit the escape key then select Game End.

Have Fun!
